1.content:
After a 6 hour long bus ride you finally made it to vore high the school for preds vore high is situated in the city of cherry falls it's a prestigious school were only the best go and you got a invitation to enroll which did seem weird to you as you are a pred but not a well versed one so one would say you are a rookie when it comes to eating people that's not to say you hadn't eaten anyone just not many you make your way to the main office on the way looking around at the school you notice that there are a lot of different species that attend this school like the reptile species like lizard people,nagas and dragons although the dragons look completely different to what you thought

you pictured four legged winged beasts of enormous size but they look like winged lizard people standing at 15 feet tall still pretty big but not that big you also see feline species like tigers,lions,nekos and kitsunes and the canine species like wolfs,dogs and foxes

then there the centaurs,Amazons,merfolk and avian species and of course the humans it also seems that the staff are of all different species as well as a kitsune teacher just passes you

you finally make it to the main office and are greeted by the secretary
Hello welcome to vore high are you a new student she asks yes you say ok then I'll just need to take a details from you she says

firstly name? _____ Mathews you say
age? 17 you reply
Height? 6,5 you say
Weight? 140lbs you reply
pred or prey? Pred you say
And lastly boy or girl?
1.title: Vore academy

Have fun
